CATHERINE ALL STARTED WITH AN INCIDENT FOUR YEARS AGO. >> Reporter: THE DECISION TO SUSPEND THE TEAM FOR THE REST OF THE SEASON IS A SERIOUS ONE AND REFLECTS HARVARD'S VIEW THAT THIS TYPE OF BEHAVIOR WAS UNACCEPTABLE AND THE DECISION TO SUSPEND THE MEN'S SOCCER TEAM WAS MADE AFTER THESE ALLEGATIONS SURFACED AND DISCOVERED THE TEAM WAS ALLEGEDLY RATING FEMALE SOCCER PLAYERS BASED ON THEIR LOOKS. WASN'T A NEW ALLEGATIONS. FIRST REPORTED LAST MONTH THAT THESE ACCUSATIONS START BACK WITH THE 2012 TEAM. FOX25 LEARNED THE RANKING SYSTEM BECAME A TRADITION AND HAS CONTINUED. STUDENTS REACTED TO THE TEAM'S SUSPENSION. >> I THINK IT IS DEFINITELY AN EMBARRASSING THING FOR THE COLLEGE AS A WHOLE. I THINK WITH THE VALUES THAT -- THAT THE COLLEGE REALLY TRIED TO EXEMPT FLY. >> Reporter: IN A STATEMENT TO FOX25, HARVARD'S PRESIDENT SAID I WAS DEEPLY DISTRESSED TO LEARN THAT THE APPALLING ACTION OF THE 2012 MEN'S SOCCER TEAM WAS NOT ISOLATED TO ONE YEAR OR THE ACTIONS OF A FEW INDIVIDUALS. WE DON'T KNOW HOW BROAD THIS IS. HOW MANY PEOPLE IN THE SOCCER TEAM WAS PARTICIPATING IN THIS TYPE OF BEHAVIOR AND HARVARD SAYS WILL CONTINUE TO EDUCATE MORE OF THE STUDENT ATHLETES PARTICULARLY THOSE OF MEN'S SOCCER TEAM.

item.title: FOX 25 Morning News at 5AM
item.description: CATHERINE PARROTTA, FOX25 NEWS. >>> A POLICE OFFICER IS ON PAID LEAVE TEXTING BEHIND THE WHEEL BEFORE HITTING A PARKED CAR. THE DEPARTMENT IS SENDING A CLEAR MESSAGE, NO ONE IS BEYOND THE LAW. A SISTER DEFENDED HER BROTHER TO OUR MALINI BASU. >> Reporter: ROOKIE POLICE OFFICER ROBERTA ADAMS IS PATROLLING IN ROWLEY. HIS JOB TO CATCH PEOPLE TEXTING WHILE DRIVING. HE WAS TEXTING IN HIS PERSONAL CAR, HIT A PARKED CAR, TOOK OFF AND CALLED FROM DOWN THE ROAD. FOX25 TALKED TO THE OFFICER'S SISTER AT THEIR LYNN HOME. >> HE WAS A GOOD GUY AND JUST AN ACCIDENT. >> Reporter: FOX25 LEARNED THE ACCIDENT HAPPENED AROUND 1:00 IN THE MORNING ON OCTOBER 21 ON THE BUSY ROAD IN LYNN. THE DARK ROAD IS HEAVILY TRAVELED AND USED AS A CUT-THRU FOR TRAVELERS. >> HE WENT HOME AND HIT A PARKED CAR. HE DIDN'T GO THAT FAR EITHER, HE KIND OF WENT DOWN PAST THE STREET. >> Reporter: A SOURCE TELLS US AFTER THE CRASH, ADAMS DROVE DOWN THE ROAD AND THEN CALLED POLICE. ADAMS ALLEGEDLY TOLD THE LYNN OFFICER HE WAS TEXTING AND DRIVING. >> CAR ACCIDENT, YOU ARE NEED TO HAVE YOUR BEARINGS AND STUFF. >>Reporter: IN A STATEMENT FROM ROWLEY'S POLICE CHIEF. OFFICER ROBERT ADAMS WAS CITED FOR LEAVING THE KEEN OF A MOTOR VEHICLE ACCIDENT AND TEXTING WHILE DRIVING. AS A RESULT OF THIS INCIDENT, I HAVE PLACED OFFICER ADAMS ON PAID ADMINISTRATIVE LEAVE. >> IT WAS BLOWN OUT OF PROPORTION, THE WHOLE THING. I MEAN, HE DIDN'T REALLY DO ANYTHING WRONG. HE CALLED THE POLICE. TOLD THEM WHAT HAPPENED. >> Reporter: ADAMS HAS BEEN ON THE JOB SINCE 2015. ADAMS SISTER SAID IT IS NOT FAIR THAT HER BROTHER IS A POSTING CHILD FOR TEXTING WHILE DRIVING CRASHES. >> I THINK IT WAS JUST AN ACCIDENT. >> Reporter: MALINI BASU, FOX25 NEWS. >> Daniel: OFFICER ADAMS WILL HAVE TO APPEAR BEFORE A JUDGE FOR THE CITATION.

item.description: >>> FOX25 INVESTIGATES OBTAINED A NEW REPORT HOW MUCH TAX MONEY WENT TO PRIVATE PARTIES FOR VIPs. THE PARTIES THROWN BY DEPARTMENT OF COMMERCE AND REBLING RATION MANAGERS USED HDZ 2500 OF TAXPAYER CASH FOR ITEMS LIKE GOLF CARTS AND EVENT PLANNING. THE AGENCY ORIGINALLY CLAIMED IT ONLY SPENT $800. THE AGENCY WORKED IN THE COMPTROLLER'S OFFICE AND THE TWO MANAGERS WHO THREW THE UNAUTHORIZED PARTY PAID BACK THE $2500.

ABOUT 65 OF THEM ARE MOVING TO THE NEW LOCATION. THE REST, THE COMPANY SAYS HALF WILL TRANSFER OUT OF STATE AND THE OTHER HALF ARE EXPECTED TO LOSE THEIR JOBS.

STEPHANIE COUEIGNOUX IS LIVE IN LAWRENCE THIS MORNING WITH WHAT WE KNOW SO FAR. >> Reporter: INVESTIGATORS SAYING HER DEATH IS SUSPICIOUS BUT THEY DON'T KNOW AND THEY ARE NOT RELEASING EXACTLY HOW SHE DIED. TAKING A LOOK BEHIND ME, THIS IS THE APARTMENT COMPLEX ON EXCHANGE STREET WHERE THEY FOUND HER BODY; HOWEVER, THEY ARE NOT SAYING AND DON'T KNOW WHETHER SHE LIVES HERE OR WAS JUST FOUND HERE. ALSO WANT TO GIVE YOU A BETTER IDEA OF THE NEIGHBORHOOD WHERE ALL OF THIS HAPPENED. YOU CAN SEE THAT THIS APARTMENT IS ROUNDED BY HOMES, POSSIBLY SOMEONE MAY HAVE SEEN SOMETHING YESTERDAY MORNING. KNEW SPOKESPERSON FOR THE ESSEX COUNTY DISTRICT ATTORNEY'S OFFICE SAYS THE WOMAN'S DEATH, AGAIN, IS SUSPICIOUS BUT NOT SAYING EXACTLY HOW SHE DIED. THEY ARE SAYING THAT THE MEDICAL EXAMINER IS EXPECTED TO DETERMINE THAT TODAY AND WILL NOT TRY TO RELEASE THAT INFORMATION BECAUSE THEY DIDN'T WANT TO COMPROMISE THAT INVESTIGATION AND STILL A LOT OF QUESTIONS LEFT UNANSWER AND WHO THIS WOMAN IS, WHETHER SHE LIVES HERE AND EXACTLY HOW SHE DIED. ACCORDING TO THE DA'S OFFICE, THE WOMAN DIED BETWEEN 5 AND 7 YESTERDAY MORNING. THEY DESCRIBE HER AS HISPANIC BETWEEN 50 AND 60 YEARS OLD. SHE WAS FOUND COMPLETELY CLOTHED INCLUDING A BLACK WOOL COAT. SHE WAS WEARING HER SNEAKERS AND HER JEWELRY WAS ALSO ON HER, THE DA'S OFFICE IS NOT SAYING WHETHER THEY HAD ANY SUSPECTS. WE ARE HOPING TO SPEAK WITH PEOPLE HERE AT THIS APARTMENT COMPLEX, AND WE ARE REACHING OUT TO THE DA'S OFFICE. AS SOON AS WE GET AN UPDATE, OF COURSE, WE WILL LET YOU KNOW. IN LAWRENCE, STEPHANIE COUEIGNOUX, FOX25 NEWS.

THE FIRE DESTROYED 1200 TOYS, 5,000 STOCKING STUFFIER AND 200 BACK PACKS FILLED WITH SUPPLIES. >> WE GOT WIPED OUT COMPLETELY ON FRIDAY NIGHT. >> Reporter: THE CHRISTMAS PARTY IS SCHEDULED FOR DECEMBER 11 AND THE GOOD SPIRIT OF STRANGERS IS HELPING. >> 41 DAYS FROM TODAY WE HAVE A PARTY FOR ALL OF THE KIDS. >> Reporter: FIRE FIGHTERS BELIEVE THAT ELECTRICAL ISSUES WERE THE FACTOR BUT HAVE NOT BEEN ABLE TO PINPOINT THE EXACT CAUSE. WE HAVE ALL THE INFORMATION ON OUR WEB SITE IN BOURNE, ROBERT GOULSTON, FOX25 NEWS.

item.title: FOX 25 Morning News at 5AM
item.description: >>> HILLARY CLINTON'S CAMPAIGN IS BEING ROCKED BY A NEW INVESTIGATION. THE FBI IS DIGGING DEEPER INTO THOUSANDS OF E-MAILS FOUND ON A DEVICE THAT BELONGED TO HER TOP AIDE, HUMA ABEDIN. HOW ABEDIN'S PERSONAL LIFE BECAME PART OF THE INVESTIGATION. >> Reporter: AFTER A SUBPOENA WAS ISSUED IN LATE SEPTEMBER, FBI INVESTIGATORS BEGAN COMBING THROUGH ANTHONY WEINER'S COMPUTER IN A SEPARATE SEXTING. ALLEGATIONS HE DENIED. AS THEY SIFTED THROUGH THE RECORD THEY FOUND E-MAILS FROM CLINTON AIDE HUMA ABEDIN HAD HAD ACCESS TO THE LAPTOP. A DEEPER DIVE ON THE MEGA DATAS WHERE THE HITS WERE UNCOVERED. THE REPUBLICAN CHAIRMAN OF THE HOUSE COMMITTEE WHO WAS NOTIFIED BY THE FBI SPOKE TO FOX NEWS SUNDAY CHRIS WALLACE. >> THIS HAS TO BE A SUBSTANTIAL DEVELOPMENT I DON'T SEE DIRECTOR COMEY OPENING IT UP UNLESS IT IS QUITE SERIOUS. >> Reporter: ABEDIN SAID SHE SENT STATE DEPARTMENT E-MAILS TO HER PERSONAL YAHOO ACCOUNT WHERE IT WAS EASIER TO PRINT THAN THE CLUMSY STATE DEPARTMENT SYSTEM IN JUNE, ABEDIN SWORE UNDER OATH IN THE FREEDOM OF INFORMATION ACT THAT SHE NEVER DELETED HER E-MAILS AND SEARCHED THROUGH ALL OF HER DEVICES FOR GOVERNMENT RECORDS AND THAT IS NOW IN QUESTION. THE RANKING DEMOCRAT ON THE COMMITTEE SAY COMEY ACTED OUTSIDE HIS LANE. >> I THINK THIS WAS A TERRIBLE ERROR IN JUDGMENT BY THE DIRECTOR TO RELEASE THIS KIND OF AMBITIOUS -- AMBIGUOUS LETTERS, THEY MAY BE SIGNIFICANT, MAY NOT BE SIGNIFICANT. THIS AMBIGUITY BOMB WAS A TERRIBLE LAPSE IN JUDGMENT. >> Reporter: IT WAS DRIVEN BY THE SHEER VOLUME OF E-MAILS AND THE COMMITMENT HE MADE UNDER OATH. >> WOULD YOU REOPEN THE CLINTON INVESTIGATION IF YOU DISCOVERED NEW INFORMATION THAT WAS BOTH RELEVANT AND SUBSTANTIAL STALL IN. >> IT'S HARD FOR ME TO ANSWER IN THE ABSTRACT. WE WOULD LOOK AT ANY NEW AND SUBSTANTIAL INFORMATION. >> Reporter: INCREASING EVIDENCE THAT JAMES COMEY AND HIS EXECUTIVE KNEW OF THE LAPTOP AND E-MAILS BEFORE THE NOTIFICATION LETTER ON FRIDAY.

item.description: >>> A FOLLOW-UP NOW TO A STORY THAT FOX25 INVESTIGATES FIRST BROKE LAST WEEK. SEVERAL REGISTERED SEX OFFENDERS LIVING IN THE SAME DORCHESTER HOME AS WE REPORTED THE ACT IS NOT AGAINST THE LAW. FOX25'S DANIEL MILLER JOINS US NOW AND DANIEL, NOW FOX25 HAS LEARNED THAT ALL OF THESE MEN WERE PLACED THERE BY A LOCAL AGENCY THAT DESCRIBES ITSELF AS A PROGRAM TO END HOMELESSNESS. >> THE AGENCY'S WEB SITE SAYS WANTS TO END AND PREVENT HOMELESSNESS. THE MAN YOU SEE LIVED IN THE HOME HERE SAYS HE UNDERSTANDS WHY NEIGHBORS ARE UPSET, BUT HE AND OTHER VETS WHO LIVE THERE ARE PART OF A PROGRAM, ALL OF THEM PLACED INTO WHAT IS NOW AN ILLEGAL ROOMING HOUSE. >>. >> I THINK PUTTING SEVEN LEVEL 3 SEX OFFENDERS IN A NEIGHBORHOOD LIKE THIS IS OFF THE WALL. >> Reporter: BILL TOLD US NOT TO SHOW HIS FACE IN CAMERA. HE LIVES IN THIS THREE-FAMILY APARTMENT AT 96 MILTON AVE IN DORCHESTER. FOX25 REVEALED THAT THE HOME IS OM PIED BY SEVERAL SEX OFFENDERS WHO ARE ALSO VETERANS. BILL IS ONE OF THEM. >> I AM A LEVEL 2 SEX OFFENDER. I HAVE BEEN OUT FOR 15 YEARS. >> Reporter: HE TELLS FOX25 AT LEAST ONE OTHER LEVEL 2 SEX OFFENDER LIVES HERE AND SEVEN LEVEL 3 SEX OFFENDERS THAT HAS NEIGHBORS SCARED AND ANGRY. >> THEY ARE NOT THINKING ABOUT THE COMMUNITY. THEY ARE NOT THINKING ABOUT THE YOUNG CHILDREN RUNNING AROUND HERE. >> Reporter: DAWN BARRETT LIVES BEHIND THE HOUSE AND HAS TWO SONS AND NOW LEARNED THAT THE HOUSE IS AN ILLEGAL ROOMING HOUSE, STRAIGHT FROM THE HEAD OF BOSTON'S INSPECTIONAL SERVICES DEPARTMENT. BUT THAT IS NOT ALL, FOX25 HAS LEARNED THAT HOME START, A NONPROFIT PLACED MANY OF THE VETERANS AT THE HOME. >> THERE IS AT LEAST, I WOULD SAY, SEVEN OR EIGHT, AND TO THE SAME PROGRAM. >> Reporter: IT IS UNCLEAR IF HOME START KNEW ALL THE VETS ARE SEX OFFENDERS. WE REACHED OUT TO THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR BY E-MAIL, BUT WE HAVE NOT HEARD BACK. HE SAYS THE HOMEOWNER WORKED WITH A LOCAL BROKER TO SEND VETS, MANY WITH SEX OFFENDER RECORDS, TO 9 MILTON AVE. BILL UNDERSTANDS WHY HIS NEIGHBORS ARE UPSET. HE SAYS ALL HE AND THE OTHER VETS WANT IS A TO FIND A NEW HOME. >> THE PEOPLE WHO LIVE IN THE HOUSE DON'T WANT TO BE THERE. NO ONE WANT TO BE THERE RIGHT NOW. >> Daniel: WE ARE INVESTIGATING WHO OWNS THAT HOUSE AND WHO ACTUALLY HELPED TO FUNNEL ALL OF THE SEX OFFENDERS TO ONE LOCATION. WE WILL KEEP YOU POSTED ON WHAT WE FIND OUT.

item.description: HE WILL FILL NEWS ON ANY UPDATES HE WILL GET. >>> A NEW REPORT IN THE DEADLY TAUNTON RAMPAGE REVEALS THAT THE SHERIFF DEPUTY THAT SHOT AND KILLED THE KNIFE-WIELDING SUSPECT WAS JUSTIFIED. MICHAEL HENRICH IS LIVE AT THE SILVER CITY GALLERIA WHERE THE RAMPAGE HAPPENED. THAT REPORT HAD NEW DETAILS OF THE MAN THAT CARRIED OUT THIS ATTACK. >> Reporter: WELL, THIS REPORT TALKS ABOUT THE DIFFERENT STORIES THAT ARTHUR DAROSA THE ATTACKER JIVE DIFFERENT PEOPLE ABOUT HIS MENTAL HEALTH THE NIGHT BEFORE AND THE MORNING OF THIS TAUNTON RAMPAGE. THE BOTTOM LINE OF THIS REPORT IS THAT THE OFF-DUTY SHERIFF DEPUTY THAT ENDED DAROSA'S LIFE DID SO LAWFULLY AND JUSTIFIABLY. LINE BY LINE IN A 13-PAGE REPORT RELEASED WEDNESDAY, THE BRISTOL COUNTY DISTRICT ATTORNEY DETAILED ARTHUR DA ROSA'S RAMPAGE THAT ENDED WITH HIM KILLING TWO PEOPLE, WOUNDING SEVERAL OTHERS AND LOSING HIS LIFE AS WELL. THE DA SAYS LESS THAN 12 HOURS AFTER BEING RELEASED FROM MORTON HOSPITAL FOR A MENTAL HEALTH EVALUATION, DAROSA CRASHED HAD IS CAR ON MYRICK STREET, RAN INTO A RANDOM HOME AND STABBED A MOTHER AND DAUGHTER KILLING THE 80-YEAR-OLD MOM PATRICIA SLAVEEN. THE 28-YEAR-OLD DAROSA DROVE TO THE MALL, CRASHED HIS CAR INTO MACY HE IS AND STARTED ASSAULTING PEOPLE BEFORE RUNNING INTO THE BERTUCCI'S RESTAURANT WHERE HE STABBED A PREGNANT WOMAN, WOUNDING HER AND FATALLY STABBED GEORGE HEATH, A MAN THAT CAME TO THAT PREGNANT WOMAN'S AID. THAT IS WHEN THE DA'S REPORT SAID THE OFF DUTY PLYMOUTH COUNTY SHERIFF DEPUTY THAT HAPPENED TO BE EATING AT THE RESTAURANT APPROACHED WITH HIS BADGE, GAVE COMMANDS TO DAROSA TO PUT DOWN HIS KNIFE, AND FIRED A SINGLE ROUND WHICH PROVED FATAL AFTER DAROSA CONTINUED TOWARD HIM. THE DA'S REPORT HERE SAYS THAT THIS OFF-DUTY SHERIFF DEPUTY LIKELY BY HIS ACTIONS SAVED MORE LIVES THAT DAY BACK IN MAY. THIS SHERIFF DEPUTY DOES PLAN TO SPEAK PUBLICLY ABOUT WHAT HAPPENED FOR THE FIRST TIME IN JUST A LITTLE BIT.

item.description: CITY AND TEAM. >>> WARNING TWITTER USERS OF A HACK THAT IS TAKING OVER THEIR CELL PHONES. ALL STARTS WITH A TWEET THAT CONTAINS A LINK SOMETIMES ASKING OTHERS TO SUPPORT A CAUSE, FOR EXAMPLE. BUT CLICKING ON THE LINK CAUSES SMARTPHONES TO AUTOMATICALLY CALL 911. THE VICTIMS SAY EVERY TIME THEY HANG UP, THE PHONE JUST STARTS CALLING 911 OVER AND OVER AGAIN. ONE WOMAN SAID THE HACK CAUSED HER PHONE TO CALL POLICE OVER 150 TIMES. >> I FEEL HORRIBLE. LIKE BLOWING UP THEIR PHONE AND I DON'T WANT THEM TO COME TO MY HOUSE WHEN THERE IS NOT AN EMERGENCY. THEY COULD BE SAVING SOMEONE ELSE'S LIFE. >> POLICE SAY THE ONLY WAY TO STOP THE HACK IS TO SHUT DOWN THE PHONE ALL THE WAY AND WAIT A FEW MINUTES BEFORE YOU POWER IT BACK ON AGAIN.

NOW THE ORANGE LINE COMMUTE AND THE T COMMUTE IN GENERAL IS IN FULL SWING FOR THE MORNING AND MBTA IS STILL INVESTIGATING WHAT CAUSED THAT SMOKE YESTERDAY CAUSING THAT PANIC-FILLED SCENE. IT WAS AN OR DEAL CAPTURED IN THIS CELL PHONE VIDEO. SMOKE FILLING AN ORANGE LINE TRAIN AS IT WAS LEAVING THE BACK BAY STATION DURING EVENING RUSH. >> HARD TO SEE AND BREATHE. PRETTY THICK SMOKE. IT WAS PRETTY CONCERNING. PEOPLE WERE COUGHING AND PANICKING. >> Reporter: PANICKING BECAUSE PASSENGERS SAY AS THAT SMOKE POURED IN, THE DOORS WOULDN'T OPEN. >> SOMEBODY SMASHED A WINDOW. THEY KICKED IT OUT AND WE ALL JUMPED OUT OF THE T THROUGH THE WINDOW. >> Reporter: SKYFOX WAS OVERHEAD AS THEY TRIED TO EVACUATION WAIT PASSENGERS AS THEY MOVED OUT COUNTRY SMOKEY STATION. >> WE WERE GROUPED UP IN ONE SPACE. RUNNING UP THE ESCALATORS. >> Reporter: AS TO WHAT CAUSED THE PROBLEM, T OFFICIALS SAY A MOTOR OVERHEADING. THEY DIDN'T WANT PASSENGERS TO FALL ON THE THIRD RAIL AND JUST THE LATEST PROBLEM FOR THE TRANSIT SYSTEM BURDENED WITH INFRASTRUCTURE. MORE THAN $100 MILLION HAVE BEEN SPENT ON MODERNIZING THE T AND MAKING IT MORE RELIABLE WITH SOME OF THAT GOING TOWARD IMPROVING INFRASTRUCTURE AND CARS ON THE RED AND ORANGE LINE. FOR PASSENGERS, MORE NEEDS TO BE DONE. >> THE T WITH SPECIAL ATTENTION. A LOT OF US USE IT EVERY DAY. >> Reporter: ONE PASSENGER SAID THEY EXPERIENCED SMOKE ON THE MBTA THREE OTHER TIMES AND CERTAINLY CONCERNING FOR SOME OF THE PASSENGERS THERE INVOLVED IN ALL OF THIS. I HAVE REACHED OUT TO THE MBTA THIS MORNING TO FIND OUT THE LATEST ON THE INVESTIGATION AND WE WILL LET YOU KNOW WHAT WE FIND OUT. LIVE IN THE BACK BAY STATION, CATHERINE PARROTTA, FOX25 MORNING NEWS.

REALLY TIGHTLY PACKED HERE AND LOOKING BEHIND ME, YOU CAN SEE THE GARAGE THAT IS NOW BOARDED UP AFTER THAT SUV PLOWED INTO IT IN THE MIDDLE OF THE AFTERNOON YESTERDAY. QUITE A SCENE HERE. LIKELY A VERY LONG HEADACHE FOR THEM AND NO ONE WAS SERIOUSLY HURT. THE TWO PEOPLE IN THAT UBER CAR WAS TAKEN TO THE HOSPITAL BUT ONLY TO BE CHECKED OUT AFTER THE CRASH. LIVE IN BEACON HILL THIS MORNING, JESSICA REYES, FOX25 MORNING NEWS.

item.title: FOX 25 Morning News at 5AM
item.description: WE ARE LIVE AS COMMUTERS GET BACK ON THE ORANGE LINE. >>> A NEW REPORT SHOW THE SHERIFF DEPUTY WHO SHOT AND KILLED THE TAUNTON STABBING SUSPECT WAS JUSTIFIED IN USING DEADLY FORCE. FOX25'S MICHAEL HENRICH LIVE AT THE SILVER CITY GALLERIA WHERE IT HAPPENED. THE REPORT HAD NEW DETAILS OF THE MAN THAT CARRIED OUT THE ATTACK. >> Reporter: WE LEARNED AGAIN THAT THE ATTACKER ARTHUR DAROSA GAVE CONFLICTING ESTIMATES HIS FAMILY AND TO THE EVALUATORS -- THE PROFESSIONAL EVALUATING AT THE HOSPITAL ABOUT HIS MENTAL HEALTH AND MORE SO IN THIS 13-PAGE REPORT JUST ISSUED YESTERDAY BY THE BRISTOL COUNTY DISTRICT ATTORNEY. THE ENTIRE INVESTIGATION INTO THE RAMPAGE THAT ENDED HERE BEHIND ME AT THE SILVER -- EXCUSE ME THE SILVER CITY GALLERIA MALL IN TAUNTON IN MAY IS LAID OUT AND THE SHERIFF DEPUTY THAT ENDED DAROSA'S LIFE WAS JUSTIFIED AND UNLAWFUL IN DOING SO. THE DA SAID THAT ARTHUR DAROSA STARTED THE RAMPAGE THAT KILLED TWO PEOPLE, LEFT TWO OTHERS STABBED AND MORE PEOPLE WOUNDED ON MYRICK STREET BACK ON MAY 10. NOW THAT'S WHEN THE REPORT DETAILS HOW DAROSA CRASHED HIS CAR, RAN INTO A RANDOM HOME AND STABBED A MOTHER AND DAUGHTER KILLING AN 80-YEAR-OLD MOM. THEN DROVE TO THE MALL, CRASHED HIS CAR INTO MACY'S AND STARTED ASSAULTING PEOPLE BEFORE RUNNING INTO THE BERTUCCI'S RESTAURANT WHERE HE STABBED A PREGNANT WOMAN WOUNDING HER AND FATALLY STABBED A MAN TRYING TO COME TO THAT PREGNANT WOMAN'S AID. THAT IS WHEN THE OFF-DUTY PLYMOUTH COUNTY SHERIFF DEPUTY WHO HAPPENED TO BE EATING AT THE RESTAURANT, APPROACHED, SHOWED HIS BADGE, GAVE DEMANDS TO DAROSA TO PUT DOWN HIS KNIFE AND FIRED A SINGLE ROUND THAT PROVED FATAL AFTER DAROSA CONTINUED TOWARD HIM. THE REPORT SAYS THAT THIS SHERIFF DEPUTY LIKELY SPARED INJURY AND DEATH TO HIMSELF AND THOSE AROUND HIM BECAUSE OF THE ACTIONS HE TOOK. HE WILL SPEAK PUBLICLY ABOUT WHAT HAPPENED FOR THE FIRST TIME LATER ON THIS MORNING, AND WE, OF COURSE, WILL BE THERE. LIVE IN TAUNTON, MICHAEL HENRICH, FOX25 NEWS.

AN COMPACTING PROCESS AND WHETHER THE MAN'S FAMILY AND PUBLIC AT LARGE SHOULD FORCE WITHOUT PREJUDGEMENT. THE HORRIFIC TRAGEDY HAS BOSTON CITY COUNCILLORS TAKING NOTICE. CITY COUNCILLOR MICHAEL FLARE TEE IS PUSHING FOR YOU TOUGHER LAWS THAT ATLANTIC DRAIN GOT A WORK PERMIT EVEN THOUGH THEY ARE ONE OF OSHA'S SEVERE VIOLATORS WITH TENS OF THOUSANDS IN UNPAID FINES. >> SO HE SHAH IS WAITING TO COLLECT ON THIS BUT HAVEN'T NOTIFIED A STATE OR INDUSTRY SAYING THIS IS A BAD CONTRACTOR. >> Reporter: OSHA SAY THEY POST THE RESULTS OF THEIR INVESTIGATION ONLINE. SAYING THIS IS THE MOST EFFICIENT MEANS OF NOTICE FOR A WIDE AUDIENCE. STATE POLICE TOLD THE "BOSTON GLOBE" IF EITHER VEHICLE HAD THOSE RECORDING DEVICES THIS HE MAY HAVE BEEN DESTROYED. SO WE PULLED THE DRIVING RECORD OF THE WRONG-WAY DRIVER VALANTEIN BURSON BETWEEN 2004 AND 2015, FIVE SPEEDING TICKETS SPLIT BETWEEN MASSACHUSETTS AND RHODE ISLAND. HER DRIVER LICENSE WAS JUST REINSTATE THIS PAST JANUARY, AND FAMILY MEMBERS ARE SPEAKING OUT ABOUT THAT WRONG-WAY DRIVER. HER MOTHER TOLD "THE GLOBE" SHE JUST LANDED HER DREAM JOB WORKING WITH PRISONER AT THE MASSACHUSETTS TREATMENT CENTER IN BRIDGEWATER. THAT FACILITY HOUSES SEX OFFENDERS AND INMATES CIVILLY COMMITTED AFTER BEING DECLARED SEXUALLY DANGEROUS. HER MOM SAID SHE WAS PLANNING TO GO BACK TO COLLEGE TO GET HER DOCTORATE DEGREE IN CLINICAL PSYCHOLOGY. AS FOR THAT NIGHT, HER BOYFRIEND SAID SHE HAD PLANNED TO ATTEND A PARTY SUNDAY NIGHT BUT DID NOT KNOW WHERE SHE WAS HEADED WHEN THE CRASH HAPPENED. THE OUTPOURING OF SUPPORT CONTINUES TODAY FOR THE FOUR COLLEGE STUDENT KILLED IN THE CRASH. A VIGIL WILL BE HELD TONIGHT IN HYANNIS AT VILLAGE GREEN AT 5:30, AND, GENE, THIS CASE ALSO HAS THE GOVERNOR'S ATTENTION. >> Gene: YOU ARE RIGHT, DANIEL, IT DOES. THE DEADLY CRASH IN MIDDLEBOROUGH IS THE FOURTH WRONG-WAY CRASH WE REPORTED ON IN THE PAST FEW MONTHS. WE TALKED TO GOVERNOR CHARLIE BAKER TO SEE IF SOMETHING CAN BE DONE TO IMPROVE SAFETY AND PREVENT THESE TYPE OF CRASHES. GOVERNOR BAKER BLAMES NO ONE AND THIS IS JUST AN AWFUL TRAGEDY AND GOES CONTINUE TO ADMIT THAT THE ON-AND-OFF RAMPS IN MASSACHUSETTS HIGHWAYS CAN BE HARD TO NAVIGATE. [INAUDIBLE] WELL, THE GOVERNOR WANTED TO SAY THAT THE STAFF IS NOW TAKING A LOOK AT WHAT THE STATE CAN DO ABOUT THE SIGNS AND TRY PREVENT SIMILAR CRASHES.

item.description: >>> A MESSAGE IN ITS BOTTLE IS COMING BACK. ERIKA RICCI SAT DOWN WITH THE DAUGHTER THAT PENNED THE LETTER. >> Reporter: THE MESSAGE IS SHORT. SOME WORDS ARE NOT EVEN LEGIBLE. >> OH, MY GOD. >> Reporter: THIS SINGLE PIECE OF PAPER OPENS THE DOORS OF COUNTLESS STORIES OF PAULA PIERCE'S FAMILY PAST AS OWNERS OF THE BEACHCOMBER MOTEL ON HAMPTON BEACH. >> WE WERE VERY CLOSE AND I SPENT A LOT OF YEARS WORKING THAT MOTEL. >> Reporter: SHORTLY AFTER HER PARENTS PAUL AND TINA BOUGHT THE MOTEL IN THE 1960s, HER FATHER LAUNCHED THIS MESSAGE IN THE BOTTLE ACROSS THE STREET AS A JOKE ON HIS WIFE AND ONLY TOLD PAULA'S HUSBAND, MARK ABOUT IT. >> I KEPT IT CLOSE TO MY HEART AND KEPT MY MOUTH SHUT. >> Reporter: THE BOTTLE WAS FORGOTTEN ABOUT BUT NOT BY THE TIDE, TRAVELED 1400 MILES TO THE CARIBBEAN ISLAND OF THE TURKS AND CAICOS WHERE IT WASHED ASHORE AND 50 YEARS LATER IN 2011 WAS FOUND BY A MAN FROM UTAH ON VACATION. >> CLINT'S PART IN THIS IS INCREDIBLE. >> Reporter: TOOK TWO MONTHS TO DECODE THE MESSAGE AND TRACK DOWN THE AUTHOR BUT PAULA'S PARENTS HAVE SINCE PASSED AND HE GOT IN TOUCH WITH HER AND FIVE YEARS LATER WAS ABLE TO REUNITE HER WITH THIS PIECE OF HER PAST. >> I KIND OF DIDN'T KNOW WHAT TO SAY. I JUST HELD IT VERY GENTLY AND LOOKED AT IT, AND HOW DID IT END UP BACK IN MY HANDS. >> Reporter: ONE MAN TRAVELED BY PLANE, TRAIN AND BUS TO GET IT THERE. >> HE SAID I CAN'T MAIL IT. I HAVE TO PUT THIS IN YOUR HANDS. I HAVE TO PUT THIS IN YOUR HANDS AND THAT'S WHAT HE DID. >> Reporter: THE BEACHCOMBER MOTEL WAS SOLD IN 2014 AND FOR PAULA IT WAS HARD TO SAY GOODBYE. SHE SAYS HAVING THIS MESSAGE NOW GIVES HER A LITTLE PIECE OF HER FAMILY LEGACY. IN HAMPTON BEACH, ERIKA RICCI, FOX25 NEWS. >> Julie: WHAT AN UNIQUE WAY TO CONNECT WITH THE PASS. >> THE EFFORT THIS MAN THAT FOUND THIS NOTE TO GET IT BACK TO THEM. >> Julie: I WOULD WANT TO HAND

item.description: >>> THIS DEADLY CRASH IN MIDDLEBOROUGH IS THE FOURTH WRONG-WAY CRASH WE HAVE REPORTED ON IN RECENT MONTHS. HE TELLS FOX25 THAT HE HAS ASKED HIS STAFF TO SEE HOW THIS TYPE OF ACCIDENT CAN BE PREVENTED. >> TAKE A LOOK AT WHAT WE CAN DO WITH RESPECT TO SIGNAGE TO DEAL WITH THIS SORT OF THING SO PEOPLE DON'T GET ON THE WRONG ROAD GOING IN THE WRONG DIRECTION. >> Reporter: STATE POLICE HAVE IDed THE WRONG DRIVER AS VALENTIN VERSEN, HE CRASHED HEAD-ON INTO A CAR KILLING ALL FOUR PEOPLE IN THE VEHICLE. SHE, TOO, DIED IN THE CRASH. THE FOUR VICTIMS KRAIG DIGGS, TROY GALVIN. 18-YEAR-OLD CORY LACADA OF WEST BABYLON, AND 19-YEAR-OLD JORDAN FISCHER OF HARWICH. DRIVING SOUTH IN THE SOUTHBOUND LANES, WHY REMAINS UNDER INVESTIGATION, BUT GOVERNOR BAKER SAYS HE BLAMES NO ONE. THERE IS SOME SUPPORT FROM MASSACHUSETTS VOTERS; HOWEVER, THERE IS ALSO THIS NEW PUSH FOR VOTERS TO REJECT QUESTION 4. IN THE FACE OF THAT NEW PUSH TO REJECT IN MEASURE COMES FROM THE WIFE OF A FALLEN STATE TROOPER THOMAS CLARDY. BACK IN MARCH, TROOPER CLARDY WAS KILLED WHEN A MEDICAL MARIJUANA PATIENT CROSSED THE PIKE AND SLAMMED INTO HIS CRUISERS. HE WAS IN AN IMPAIRED STATE AND HAD A HALF-BURNED MARIJUANA CIGARETTE IN HIS CAR THE TIME OF THE CRASH. RAI SA CLARDY APPEARS IN A NEW ON-LINE AD URGING VOTERS TO DEFEAT AMENDMENT 4. >> THERE WILL BE MORE ACCIDENTS AND FATALITIES. FAMILIES WITHOUT THEIR LOVED ONES BECAUSE WE ARE PUTTING -- WE ARE PUTTING PEOPLE AT RISK. IF IT HAPPENED TO MY FAMILY, IT CAN HAPPEN TO ANYBODY. >> Reporter: DESPITE THE PUSH BACK, THE BALLOT QUESTION DOES HAVE ITS SUPPORTERS. EVERYBODY LOVED HIM. >> I WAS OUT WORKING ON MY TRUCK AND HE ALWAYS COMES SEES ME BEFORE HE LEAVES. A BIG HUG AND A KISS. DRIVE SAFELY. THE GROUP NOW ADVISES THAT CHILDREN UNDER 18 MONTHS SEE SCREENS ONLY IN THE FORM OF VIDEO CHATTING, FACE TIME AND SKYPE. item.description: AS THEY WALK TO SCHOOL. >> INVESTIGATORS SAY A 13-YEAR-OLD GIRL WAS ABDUCTED, DRAGGED INTO AN APARTMENT BUILDING AND SEXUAL ASSAULTED ON HER WAY TO SCHOOL. MICHAEL HENRICH IS LIVE IN LAWRENCE. THE GIRL GAVE A DESCRIPTION OF HER ATTACKER TO POLICE, AND THEY WERE ABLE TO CATCH HIM PRETTY QUICKLY. >> Reporter: JUST WITHIN A CUP OF HOURS THEY MADE AN ARREST. BUT IN SPITE OF THAT, THE MAYOR AND THE POLICE DEPARTMENT WANT TO MAKE SURE THAT EVERYONE IS SAFE AND WANT TO MAKE SURE THAT EVERYONE IS SAFE AS THEY HEAD TO SCHOOL. WE ARE RIGHT ACROSS THE STREET FROM THE EAST LAWRENCE EDUCATIONAL COMPLEX WHERE THAT 13 -YEAR-OLD GIRL WAS WALKING WHEN SHE WAS ABDUCTED. THE TWO THINGS THAT ARE HAPPENING THIS MORNING. FIRST AS POLICE MENTIONED, STEPPING UP PATROLS IN CERTAIN AREAS OF LAWRENCE SCHOOLS. THE SECOND THING, THE MAYOR HAS ASKED THE POLICE DEPARTMENT TO REVIEW A LIST OF ALL PEOPLE LIVING IN LAWRENCE WEARING ANKLE MONITORING BRACE LET TO SEE IF THEY LIVE NEAR A SCHOOL AND ASSESS THEIR THREAT LEVEL. THE REASON THEY ARE DOING THAT IS BECAUSE THE MAN THEY ARRESTED FOR THIS CRIME, 21-YEAR-OLD ANGEL MATEO WAS WEARING, ACCORDING TO POLICE, A PRETRIAL ANKLE BRACELET DURING THE TIME OF THIS ALLEGED ATTACK. MATEO IS NOT A SEX OFFENDER, BUT THE MAYOR SAYS HE BELIEVES THERE IS A CONNECTION BETWEEN THIS CRIME AND THE UNDISCLOSED REASON WHY THE COURTS INITIALLY FORCED MATEO TO WEAR THIS MONITORING SYSTEM. MATEO GRABBED AND FORCIBLY DRAGGED A 13-YEAR-OLD GIRL INTO A SECOND-FLOOR APARTMENT AND SEXUALLY ASSAULTING HER WHEN HE KEPT HER HERE FOR OVER A TWO-HOUR PERIOD. PARENT THAT LAWRENCE SHOCKED ABOUT WHAT THEY SAY HAPPENED WILL KEEP AN EXTRA CLOSE EYE ON THE CHILDREN. >> I WAS BORN AND RAISED IN LAWRENCE. YOU WALKED TO SCHOOL AND NOW IT IS GETTING WORSE. >> WOULD YOU LET YOUR KIDS WALK TO SCHOOL? >> NO, NOT ANYMORE. DEFINITELY NOT NOW. >> Reporter: MATEO FACES A JUDGE THIS MORNING AND WILL BE ARRAIGNED ON KIDNAPPING AND AGGRAVATED STATUTORY RAPE CHARGES. AHEAD IN 30 MINUTES, HEAR FROM THE MAYOR AS HE HEARS HIS REACTION TO A, QUOTE, UNSPEAKABLE CRIME AND HEAR HOW THIS GIRL WAS ABLE TO GET FREE AND REPORT THE CRIME TO POLICE. FOR NOW, LIVE IN LAWRENCE, MICHAEL HENRICH, FOX25 MORNING NEWS.

item.description: >>> HAPPENING RIGHT NOW, POLICE IN LAWRENCE ARE KEEPING A CLOSER WATCH ON KIDS AS THEY WALKED TO SCHOOL THIS MORNING. >> IT IS IN RESPONSE TO A DISTURBING CRIME YESTERDAY. AND WE HAVE TO DO ALL THAT IS POSSIBLE FOR THE MOST VULNERABLE CITIZENS. >> Reporter: POLICE ARRESTED 21-YEAR-OLD ANGEL MATEO HOURS AFTER INVESTIGATORS SAY HE GRABBED A 13-YEAR-OLD GIRL AS SHE WALKED TO SCHOOL THURSDAY MORNING, DRAGGED HER INTO A SECOND FLOOR PHILLIP STREET APARTMENT AND SEXUALLY ASSAULTED HER OVER A TWO-HOUR PERIOD. THE MAYOR SAYS THAT MATEO IS NOT A SEX OFFENDER. THE MAYOR THINKS THERE IS A CONNECTION BETWEEN THIS CRIME AND THE UNDISCLOSED REASON WHY THE COURTS FORCED MATEO TO WEAR THAT MONITORING SYSTEM. THAT IS WHY THE MAYOR IS ASKING THE POLICE DEPARTMENT TO REVIEW A LIST OF PEOPLE IN LAWRENCE WEARING ANKLE MONITORING BRACELETS TO SEE HOW CLOSE THEY LIVE THROUGH SCHOOL AND ASSESS THEIR THREAT LEVEL. AS FOR MATEO WILL FACE A JUDGE ON KIDNAPPING AND STATUTORY RAPE CHARGES. AND A POPULAR SPOT FOR KIDS DURING THE DAY. JUAN'S FAMILY MEMBERS, THEY SAY THEY ARE VERY RELIEVED THAT POLICE WERE ABLE TO ARREST THIS SUSPECT AS QUICKLY AS THEY DID, BUT THEY DO SAY IT IS NOT ENOUGH FOR THEM TO STAY SAFE HERE AND THEY PLAN TO MOVE IN THE VERY NEAR FUTURE. item.description: >> Reporter: POLICE SAY TWO BLOCKS AWAY LESS THAN A QUARTER OF A MILE FROM SOUTH LAWRENCE EAST EDUCATIONAL COMPLEX WHERE SHE GOES TO SCHOOL. SHE WAS SO CLOSE TO BEING IN A SAFE PLACE WHEN POLICE SAY THAT MAN ABDUCTED AND SEXUALLY ASSAULTED HER. A COUPLE OF THINGS ARE HAPPENING THIS MORNING. FIRST AND FOREMOST EVEN WITH THE ARRESTS MADE POLICE ARE STEPPING UP PATROLS IN THE AREA OF LAWRENCE SCHOOLS TO MAKE SURE KIDS GET TO SCHOOL SAFELY. SECOND, THE MAYOR HAS ASKED THE POLICE DEPARTMENT TO REVIEW EVERY INDIVIDUAL WHO HAS AN ANKLE MONITORING BRACELET ON AND WHO LIVES NEAR A SCHOOL AND MAKE SURE THAT THEY ARE IN THE UP AND UP AND WHERE THEY ARE SUPPOSED TO BE. WHY THAT PARTICULAR STEP SNAPPING BECAUSE POLICE SAY THAT THE MAN THEY ARRESTED, 21-YEAR-OLD ANGEL MATEO WEARING A PRETRIAL ANKLE BRACELET DURING THE TIME OF THIS ALLEGED AIT CAN. MATEO IS NOT A SEX OFFENDER BUT THE MAYOR THINKS THERE IS A CONNECTION BETWEEN IN CRIME AND THE UNDISCLOSED REASON THAT THE COURTS FORCED MATEO TO WIN THE MONITORING SYSTEM IN THE FIRST PLACE. MATEO DRAGGED AND FORCIBLY DRAGGED A 13-YEAR-OLD GIRL INTO A SECOND-FLOOR APARTMENT ON PHILLIPS STREET AROUND 8:00 YESTERDAY MORNING, SEXUALLY ASSAULTING HER AS HE KEPT HER THERE FOR A TWO-HOUR PERIOD. >> THIS CRIME IS UNSPEAKABLE AND WE NEED TO DO ALL THAT IS POSSIBLE FOR THE MOST VULNERABLE CITIZENS. >> Reporter: THE YOUNG VICTIM REPORTED WHAT HAPPENED TO HER SCHOOL. THEN POLICE -- AND THEN TO POLICE. AND GAVE INVESTIGATORS A DETAILED DESCRIPTION OF HER ATTACKER, WHICH LED THEM TO MATEO WITHIN HOURS. BUT ONCE AGAIN, THAT SUSPECT IS IN CUSTODY. HE IS 19 YEARS OLD FROM EVERETT AND DUE OVER AT CHELSEA DISTRICT COURT FOR HIS ARRAIGNMENT AND, OF COURSE, WE HAVE A CREW IN THE COURT ROOM AS THAT IS ALL HAPPENING IN JUST A COUPLE OF HOURS. TEAMMATE TO FALL OFF THE BUS. >> Reporter: SOMEONE DID FALL OFF THE SCHOOL BUS IT WAKEFIELD. >> MY FRIEND WAS TEXTING ME ON A GROUP CHAT AND SHE SAID SHE WAS SITTING IN FRONT OF HIM AND SHE SAW HIM LEANING AND HE FELL OUT THE BOOK DOOR. >> Reporter: OFFICIALS SAY THE STUDENT WAS FROM THE GALVIN MIDDLE SCHOOL AND IT HAPPENED PULLING OUT OF THE ELEMENTARY SCHOOL. >> SAID THE CARS BEHIND HIM LUCKILY STOPPED SO THEY DIDN'T RUN HIM OVER. >> COULD HAVE BEEN A LOT WORSE. IT COULD HAVE BEEN A LOT WORSE, I WAS NOT SURE HOW THIS HAPPENED IN THE FIRST PLACE. HOW COULD IT NOT HAPPEN ON THE SEAT. THE STATE LAW FOR THE OPERATION OF SCHOOL BUSES IS CLEAR, ACCORDING TO SECTION 7 B OF CHAPTER 90, THE BUS OPERATOR CAN'T ALLOW THE NUMBER OF STUDENTS TO EXCEED THE NUMBER OF SEATS ON THE BUS AND THE OPERATOR CAN'T DRIVE THE BUS. IF THE BUS HAS ADEQUATE STRAPS AND HANDLES THREE PEOPLE MIGHT BE ABLE TO STAND. UNCLEAR IF THE STUDENT WAS SITTING OR STANDING. item.description: WITNESSES TO BE INTERVIEWED BY HOMICIDE DETECTIVES. >>> A 13-YEAR-OLD BOY IS NURSING A BULLET WOUND THIS MORNING AFTER BEING HIT WHILE SITTING INSIDE HIS APARTMENT. FOX25'S JESSICA REYES LIVE IN CHELSEA THIS MORNING LIVE WITH MORE ON WHERE THAT BULLET CAME FROM. JESS, GOOD MORNING. >> Reporter: GOOD MORNING, GENE. ALL HAPPENED AT BELLINGHAM AND SHAMUT STREET IN CHELSEA JUST AFTER 8:30. WE SPOKE WITH THAT 13-YEAR-OLD BOY'S BROTHER AND HE SAID A CAR PULLED OUT RIGHT OUTSIDE THIS PARK. SOMEONE GOT OUT OF THE CAR AND STARTED SHOOTING AND HE BELIEVE ANOTHER PERSON WAS SHOOTING FROM INSIDE THE CAR. SEVERAL SHOTS HE SAID WERE FIRED. ABOUT SEVEN OR EIGHT. ONE OF WHICH ENDED UP IN THE SIDE OF THIS BUILDING. IT WENT THROUGH THE WALL AND ENDED UP HITTING THAT 13-YEAR-OLD BOY IN THE SHOULDER. >> I RAN TO MY HOUSE, AND THEN I SEE MY BROTHER ON THE FLOOR AND HE WAS SHOT, LIKE, IN THE BACK. HE WAS SITTING DOWN IN HIS ROOM ON THE BED AND THE BULLET WENT THROUGH THE WALL AND HIT HIM IN THE BACK. SO I GUESS HE GOT OFF THE BED AND STARTED RUNNING TO MY MOM'S ROOM AND JUST SAT DOWN, BECAUSE IT HURT HIM. SAT DOWN ON THE FLOOR AND HE WAS YELLING "IT HURTS, IT HURTS:". >> Reporter: HE WAS TAKEN TO THE HOSPITAL, BUT WE ARE TOLD HE IS EXPECTED TO BE OKAY. NO ONE HAS BEEN ARRESTED AT THIS POINT, BUT POLICE DID SAY THAT TWO PEOPLE WERE SEEN LEAVING THE AREA AND WHAT THEY BELIEVE WAS A DARK COLORED SUV. ANYONE WITH ANY INFORMATION AT ALL IS ASKED TO CONTACT CHELSEA POLICE. LIVE IN CHELSEA, JESSICA REYES,

item.title: FOX 25 Morning News at 7AM
item.description: >>> BACK AT 5:15. QUESTIONS SURROUNDING A SCHOOL BUS AFTER A MIDDLE SCHOOL STUDENT FALLS OUT OF THE BACK OF THE DOOR -- FALLS OUT THE BACK DOOR, THAT IS, AND INTO TRAFFIC. FOX25'S CATHERINE PARROTTA IS LIVE IN WAKEFIELD THIS MORNING WITH THE INVESTIGATION INTO WHAT WENT WRONG. CATHERINE, GOOD MORNING. >> Reporter: GOOD MORNING. THAT STUDENT WAS RESTING AT HOME LAST NIGHT. WE ARE TOLD THAT THE STUDENT WAS ALERT AFTER THIS HAPPENED, BUT THE INVESTIGATION INTO HOW IT HAPPENED CONTINUES TODAY. ACCORDING TO SCHOOL OFFICIALS, THIS HAPPENED ON A SCHOOL BUS AFTER SCHOOL ON THE DRIVE HOME. AND THE STUDENT INVOLVED HERE WAS A STUDENT FROM THE GALVIN MIDDLE SCHOOL AND FELL OUT OF THE BACK DOOR OF THE MOVING BUS AS IT WAS PULLING OUT OF THE BACK OF AN ELEMENTARY SCHOOL A MILE AND A HALF AWAY FROM THE MIDDLE SCHOOL. A STUDENT DESCRIBES WHAT SHE HEARD ABOUT THE INCIDENT. >> MY FRIEND WAS TEXTING ME ON, LIKE, A GROUP CHAT AND SHE SAID SHE WAS SITTING IN FRONT OF HIM AND SAW HIM, LIKE, LEANING AND HE FELL OUT THE BACK DOOR. SHE SAID THAT, LIKE, THE CARS BEHIND THEM LUCKILY STOPPED SO THEY DIDN'T RUN HIM OVER. >> STUDENTS ALSO DESCRIBE THAT BUS AS BECOME PACKED. DESPITE ALL OF THAT NO ONE KNOWS HOW THIS HAPPENED. THE SUPERINTENDENT SAYS THEY ARE INVESTIGATING THIS IN COOPERATION WITH THE BUS COMPANY, AND THIS BUS THAT WAS INVOLVED HAS BEEN TAKEN OUT OF SERVICE TODAY. I HAVE ALSO REACHED OUT TO THE SUPERINTENDENT TO SEE IF WE CAN GET AN UPDATE. IN THE MEANTIME, I LOOKED INTO THE LAWS FOR OPERATING A SCHOOL BUS, AND HE WILL HAVE THAT INFORMATION COMING UP IN AN HOUR. LIVE IN WAKEFIELD, CATHERINE PARROTTA, FOX25 MORNING NEWS.

item.description: >>> NOW 4:0. A BULLET HIT A TEENAGER IN CHELSEA. THIS MORNING POLICE ARE LOOKING FOR TWO MEN WHO SPED OFF FROM THE SCENE OF THE CRIME. FOX25'S JIM MORELLI FIRST SPOKE TO THE VICTIM'S BROTHER WHO SAID THE BULLET CAME THROUGH THE WALL. >> WE SPOKE TO A WITNESS OUTSIDE WHEN THE SHOOTING BEGAN AND WHAT HE TELLS US A CAR PULLED UP, A WHITE VEHICLE, SOMEONE GOT OUT OF THE CAR AND STARTED SHOOTING INDISCRIMINATELY OUTSIDE OF THIS PARK. BELIEVES SOMEONE WAS IN THE CAR SHOOTING FROM THE CAR AS WELL. A WARM NIGHT. MANY PEOPLE IN THE PARK. THEY ALL STARTED TO RUN. HE STARTED TO RUN AND HE LIVES IN THE HOUSE NEXT DOOR WHICH IS RIGHT UP HERE ON THE THIRD FLOOR. AND HE TELLS US THAT HIS BROTHER, HIS YOUNGER BROTHER AGE 13 WAS ACTUALLY HIT BY A BULLET THAT PENETRATED THE WALL NEAR ONE OF THE WINDOWS. >> I RAN TO MY HOUSE, AND THEN I SEE MY BROTHER ON THE FLOOR AND HE WAS SHOT IN THE BACK. HE WAS SITTING DOWN IN HIS ROOM ON THE BED, AND THEN THE BULLET WENT THROUGH THE WALL AND HIT HIM IN THE BACK. SO EN I GUESS HE GOT OFF THE BED AND STARTED RUNNING TO MY MOM'S ROOM AND JUST SAT DOWN BECAUSE IT HURT HIM. HE SAT DOWN ON THE FLOOR AND JUST YELLING, IT HURTS, IT HURTS. >> Reporter: I WAS DOWN THE STREET A LITTLE EARLIER AND SOMEONE WALKED BY WHO WAS IN THE NEIGHBORHOOD AND SHE WANTED TO KNOW WHAT HAPPENED. item.description: >>> IT IS 4:02 RIGHT NOW. SQUARING OFF IN A KEY BATTLEGROUND STATE OF NEVADA. JOE WALDMAN REPORTS THIS MATCH-UP HIT ON POLICY TOPICS BEGINNING WITH THE SUPREME COURT. >> Reporter: HILLARY CLINTON AND DONALD TRUMP'S CAMPAIGNS ARE IN FULL SPIN ROAD. EACH SIDE MAKING A CASE THAT THEIR CANDIDATE WON IN WHAT WAS A HIGH-STAKES DEBATE. >> WE NEED A SUPREME COURT THAT WILL STAND UP ON BEHALF OF WOMEN'S RIGHTS AND ON BEHALF OF THE RIGHTS OF THE LBG T COMMUNITY. >> WE NEED A SUPREME COURT THAT, FROM N MY OPINION, THAT WILL UPHOLD THE SECOND AMENDMENT. >> Reporter: AFTER AN ICY GREETING, HILLARY CLINTON AND DONALD TRUMP SQUARING OFF ONE FINAL TIME. >> NO DOUBT THAT I RESPECT THE SECOND AMENDMENT, THAT I ALSO BELIEVE THERE IS AN INDIVIDUAL RIGHT TO BEAR ARMS. THAT IS NOT IN CONFLICT WITH SENSIBLE, COMMON SENSE REGULATION. >> Reporter: THIS THE LAST MAJOR PLATFORM FOR EACH TO MAKE CLOSING ARGUMENTS. >> SHE WANTS TO GIVE AMNESTY WHICH IS A DISASTER AND VERY UNFAIR FOR ALL THE PEOPLE WAITING IN LINE FOR YEARS AND YEARS. HE CHOKED. >> SHE NATURALLY GETS NOTHING DONE AND THE WALL WASN'T BUILT, BUT HILLARY CLINTON WANTED THE WALL. >> I VOTED FOR BORDER SECURITY -- >> A WALL. >> AND THERE ARE LIMITED PLACE WHERE IS THAT WAS APPROPRIATE. THERE ALSO IS NECESSARILY GOING TO BE NEW TECHNOLOGY AND HOW BEST TO DEPLOY THAT. >> Reporter: LESS THAN THREE WEEKS UNTIL THE ELECTION, THE BIG QUESTION NOW WHAT IMPACT DID THIS DEBATE JUST HAVE. ALL THIS AS PRESIDENT OBAMA IS WORRIED THAT VIOLENCE COULD BREAK OUT IF DONALD TRUMP LOSES OF ELECTION. IN LAS VEGAS, PHIL WALTMAN. >> THE DEBATES ARE CAN'T WATCH TV. MORE PEOPLE WATCHED THE LAST DEBATE THAN THE PATS LOSS IN THE NFC CHAMPIONSHIP. >> Julie: A WATCH PARTY WHERE VIEWER REACTIONS WERE REWARDED WITH PRIZES. >> Reporter: TONIGHT WE HUNG OUT WITH A MOSTLY YOUNGER, PROFESSIONAL, URBAN CROWD AND SAFE TO SAY THAT MOST HERE FAVOR HILLARY CLINTON. THAT BEING SAID THOUGH, MANY ARE CONCERNED ABOUT THE WAY THE ENTIRE ELECTION, THE ENTIRE RACE IS PLAYED OUT. THEY SAY THERE HAS BEEN TOO MUCH BICKERING AND NOT ENOUGH SUBSTANCE. TAKE A LOOK AT THE LINE OF THE PEOPLE READY TO GET IN. THEY REACHED CAPACITY WELL BEFORE THE DEBATE STARTED AND SOME PEOPLE HAD TO BE TURNED AWAY. THE DEBATE WAS DISPLAYED ON LARGE PROJECTION SCREENS AND THIS CROWD WAS HOOKED. SOME OF THE REACTION. THE FIRST WOMAN YOU ARE GOING TO HEAR FROM SAID SHE THINKS TRUMP MADE GOOD POINTS, BUT SHE WANTED HIM TO BE MORE ASSERTIVE AND CLEAR ON THE RECENT SEXUAL ASSAULT ALLEGATIONS. >> I WOULD LIKE HIM TO ADDRESS IT. IF IT IS NOT WHO HE IS, INSTEAD OF JUST SAYING, NO, I -- NO ONE RESPECTS WOMEN MORE THAN I DO. NOT WHAT YOUR SO-CALLED LOCKER ROOM TALK HAS SAID AND I WOULD LIKE IT BROUGHT UP AND TO BE ABLE TO HEAR IT. >> BOTH THE CANDIDATES TALKED OVER EACH OTHER. NOT A GREAT DEBATE SET-UP. SEEMS MORE LIKE A FISTFIGHT THAN A DEBATE. >> Reporter: IN ADDITION TO WATCHING THE DEBATE ON THE SCREENS, THE BAR HAD A TWITTER FEED UP WHERE PEOPLE COULD CHIME IN AND GIVE THEIR OPINIONS AS THE DEBATE WAS ONGOING. REPORTING IN SOMERVILLE, TED DANIEL, FOX25 NEWS. >> Julie: WHAT WOULD A DEBATE BE WITHOUT TWITTER. REACTION POURING IN ABOUT THE DEBATE ON THE SOCIAL MEDIA SITE FROM LOCAL POLITICIANS. SENATOR ELIZABETH WARREN SAID HILLARY CLINTON PROVED SHE HAS BRAINS, GUTS, THICK SKIN, STEADY HANDS AND MOST OF ALL BASIC DEASON KNEE. I AM WITH HER AND PROUD OF HER. FORMER SOX PITCHER A TRUMP SUPPORTER WHO PLANS TO RUN FOR WARREN'S SENATE SEAT SAID, WOW, SPENT 90 MINUTES AND LIED FOR 5400 CONSECUTIVE. WALLACE WAS OUTSTANDING. SHOWCASING CHRIS WALLACE WHO ANCHOR AND MODERATED THE DEBATE. >> SCOTT BROWN SAID, WOW, CONGRATS DONALD TRUMP. BIG WIN. HE SPOKE PLAINLY TO REGULAR HAVE FOLKS. SHE STRUGTH. LET THE GAMES BEGIN, HURRAH. SETH MOULTON WHAT A CONTRAST, A AN OPTIMISTIC PLAN FOR OUR FUTURE VERSUS A CYNICAL DIATRIBE. AND EXPERTS WEIGHED IN GIVING THEIR TAKE ON ROUMD THREE. item.description: >>> NOW 4:0. A BULLET HIT A TEENAGER IN CHELSEA. THIS MORNING POLICE ARE LOOKING FOR TWO MEN WHO SPED OFF FROM THE SCENE OF THE CRIME. FOX25'S JIM MORELLI FIRST SPOKE TO THE VICTIM'S BROTHER WHO SAID THE BULLET CAME THROUGH THE WALL. >> WE SPOKE TO A WITNESS OUTSIDE WHEN THE SHOOTING BEGAN AND WHAT HE TELLS US A CAR PULLED UP, A WHITE VEHICLE, SOMEONE GOT OUT OF THE CAR AND STARTED SHOOTING INDISCRIMINATELY OUTSIDE OF THIS PARK. BELIEVES SOMEONE WAS IN THE CAR SHOOTING FROM THE CAR AS WELL. A WARM NIGHT. MANY PEOPLE IN THE PARK. THEY ALL STARTED TO RUN. HE STARTED TO RUN AND HE LIVES IN THE HOUSE NEXT DOOR WHICH IS RIGHT UP HERE ON THE THIRD FLOOR. AND HE TELLS US THAT HIS BROTHER, HIS YOUNGER BROTHER AGE 13 WAS ACTUALLY HIT BY A BULLET THAT PENETRATED THE WALL NEAR ONE OF THE WINDOWS. >> I RAN TO MY HOUSE, AND THEN I SEE MY BROTHER ON THE FLOOR AND HE WAS SHOT IN THE BACK. HE WAS SITTING DOWN IN HIS ROOM ON THE BED, AND THEN THE BULLET WENT THROUGH THE WALL AND HIT HIM IN THE BACK. SO EN I GUESS HE GOT OFF THE BED AND STARTED RUNNING TO MY MOM'S ROOM AND JUST SAT DOWN BECAUSE IT HURT HIM. HE SAT DOWN ON THE FLOOR AND JUST YELLING, IT HURTS, IT HURTS. >> Reporter: I WAS DOWN THE STREET A LITTLE EARLIER AND SOMEONE WALKED BY WHO WAS IN THE NEIGHBORHOOD AND SHE WANTED TO KNOW WHAT HAPPENED. I SAID THERE WAS A SHOOTING AND EXPLAINED TO HER THAT A 13-YEAR-OLD CHILD WAS HIT WITH A STRAY BULLET AND SHE SAID I WONDER IF THIS IS RELATED TO A SHOOTING THAT HAPPENED TWO STREETS OVER HERE IN WHICH SOMEONE, SHE SAYS, WAS ACTUALLY KILLED. AND IN ANY CASE, THE LAST THING SHE SAID TO ME I AM GOING INSIDE BECAUSE THINGS AROUND HERE ARE GETTING SCARY. IN CHELSEA, JIM MORELLI, FOX25 NEWS.

item.description: >>> POLICE AND NEIGHBORS RALLYING TOGETHER TO OFFER SUPPORT FOR THE OFFICERS WHILE THEY HEAL AND WE ARE NOW HEARING FROM A FORMER OFFICER WHO KNOWS BOTH MEN. GOOD MORNING, CATHERINE. >> Reporter: GOOD MORNING, BOTH OFFICERS RECOVERING AT MASS GENERAL HOSPITAL AND NOT OUT OF THE WOODS YET. REASON TO BE OPTIMISTIC. VETERAN POLICE OFFICERS AND WE ARE LEARNING MORE ABOUT THEM EVEN STILL TODAY. BOTH OF THOSE OFFICERS WERE SHOT AND WOUNDED WHILE THEY WERE RESPONDING TO DOMESTIC CALL IN EAST BOSTON. OFFICER MATTHEW MORRIS HAS BEEN ON THE FORCE FOR 2 YEARS. SHOT IN A MAJOR ARTERY IN THE LEG. IN 2006 ORDERED THE MEDAL OF HONOR THE HIGHEST HONOR AFTER A ARMED AND MASKED 15-YEAR-OLD BEGAN FIRING INTO A BUS STOP. OFFICER CINTOLO HAS BEEN ON THE FORCE FOR 27 YEARS AND THE FATHER OF THREE COMES FROM A POLICE FAMILY. BACK IN 1980 HIS FATHER WAS ALSO SHOT RESPONDING TO A DOMESTIC CALL. WE TALKED TO A DORCHESTER NATIVE A BOSTON POLICE OFFICER FOR 35 YEARS. HE WORKED WITH BOTH WOUNDED OFFICERS. >> IT IS PRETTY DISTURBING WHEN ANY POLICE OFFICER, ANYWHERE GETS SHOT. THEY ARE POINT OF THE SPEAR. THEY ARE AT THE FRONT LINE. AND WHEN SOMETHING LIKE THAT HAPPENS TO THEM, IT AFFECTS EVERYBODY. HOPING THAT THEY WOULD PULL OUT OF IT OKAY. I DON'T LIKE TO SEE ANY -- THAT'S -- YOU KNOW THEY WERE SHOT UP PRETTY BAD, I THINK. >> Reporter: LEAHY SAID IN ADDITION TO KNOWING BOTH OF THOSE OFFICERS HE WORKED WITH OFFICER CINTOLO'S FATHER AND SAYS THE PRAYERS ARE WITH THE FAMILIES AND WITH MANY PEOPLE IN THE COMMUNITY. MORE THAN 100 PEOPLE CAME TOGETHER FOR A PRAYER VIGIL. THE SIGHTS AND SOUNDS IN ABOUT A AN HOUR. LIVE AT MASS GENERAL HOSPITAL, CATHERINE PARROTTA, FOX25

item.title: FOX 25 Morning News at 5AM
item.description: >>> A DEADLY PLANE CRASH IN EAST HARTFORD, CONNECTICUT APPEARS TO BE A CASE OF SUICIDE. SOURCES TELL THE ASSOCIATED PRESS THAT A STUDENT PILOT IS UPSET AND STARTED TO FIGHT WITH THE INSTRUCTOR. THE INSTRUCTOR TRIED TO REGAIN CONTROL OF THE PLANE BUT FAILED. THE STUDENT DIED BUT INSTRUCTOR SURVIVED AND SPOKEN WITH INVESTIGATORS. THE FBI IS WORKING WITH POLICE IN EAST HARTFORD TO FIND OUT WHY THE STUDENT PILOT WAS SUICIDAL.
